page.title: 08SCHOOL EISTEDDFOD, SWANSEA
page.content: In our school (Mynyddbach Girls' School) the 1st March is celebrated by an Eisteddfod.The school is split up into four houses;Powys,Gwynedd,Dyfed and Morgannwg,each with a house captain.Many competitions are held on the day,including house choirs,dance groups,poetry recitals and musical compositions.Also subject competitions are held and judged before the 1st March,then the points awarded for every entry are put to the total score for the different houses. A big cup is awarded to the winning house. There is also a cup awarded to the winning choir and to the winning sport group. A big thing is made out of March 1st and everyone looks forward to the day. Lots of banners and rosettes are made and everyone has a good time.
